nodes.text: The planet Thule was home to an expansive armory complex that lay some forty kilometers outside the capital city of Hurom.

This complex contained facilities ranging from weapons caches housing racks of blaster rifles and pistols of every model to archives in which plans for Sith superweapons and vehicles were catalogued. One particularly fortified facility near the center of the complex was used exclusively to store crystals, power packs, and other components employed in lightsaber construction.

The armory was notable for being the location at which the Dark Reaper, an ancient superweapon of the Sith Empire, was assembled during the Great Hyperspace War. The weapon was initially constructed in one of the armory's hangars before eventually being disassembled and relocated to Kessiak a millennium later by an invading Jedi task force during the Battle of Thule.
